com.youama.nexus.parser.collector

Class TextCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.youama.nexus.parser.collector.Collector
      • com.youama.nexus.parser.collector.TextCollector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICollector

    public class TextCollector
extends Collector
implements ICollector
    This class implements the Collector and ICollector. TextCollector collects words by different rules. This class should not be referenced directly, it is handled by the FactoryCollector class.
    Since:
    2015.08.01.
    Author:
    David Belicza - 87.bdavid@gmail.com

      • parseByRule

        public void parseByRule(int rule)

        Parameters:

      • collectText

        protected void collectText(String htmlTag)
        It selects the clear text from an HTML document by the name of the HTML tag then it splits the text to sentences and words. When it finished it retrieves the separated, collected words.
        Parameters:
        htmlTag - The html tag as a String. "title" for example.
